trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a property that takes a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 采用的属性值进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>根据一组关键帧。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animation's target values are defined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画的目标值由定义其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>属性，其中包含一套<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>定义的具有其自己目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A>动画段</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: 动画运行时，它从进展一个键值为在指定下一步键次。

trans-unit.source: There are three types of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> classes, one for each supported interpolation method: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearRectKeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteRectKeyFrame>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineRectKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 有三种类型的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>类，一个用于每个受支持的内插方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearRectKeyFrame>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteRectKeyFrame>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineRectKeyFrame>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineRectKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteRectKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearRectKeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimation>, a RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames can have more than two target values.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimation>，RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames 可以有两个以上的目标值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimation>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interpolation method of individual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> segments.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以控制个人的内插方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 添加子<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method allows <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> objects to be direct children of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object in markup.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>要成为对象的直接子级<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames>标记中的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: The object to add as the child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要作为此的子级添加的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The child parameter is not a .
trans-unit.target: The child parameter is not a .

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将文本字符串添加为此子<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到文本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Child text cannot be added because <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> does not accept text as a child until a derived class overrides this behavior to allow text to be added.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加子文本，因为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>不接受文本为子级直到派生的类重写此行为，以允许添加文本。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定的深层副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>克隆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定的可修改深层副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>使用当前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>克隆。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object read-only (frozen) or determines whether it can be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>对象只读 （冻结），或确定是否可使其成为只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to check if this instance can be frozen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to freeze this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要检查此实例是否可以冻结;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>冻结此实例。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if this can be made read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 是 ，此方法返回如果此可成为只读的或如果它不能成为只读的。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if this is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 是 ，此方法返回如果此现在是只读的或如果无法成为只读的并且具有已开始更改此对象冻结的状态的副作用。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: If these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些属性包含资源的引用或数据绑定，<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object to clone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>要克隆对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定的冻结的复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>要复制和冻结。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个值，表示正进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并确定此实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>未停止。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise, the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则，值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的原始值，如果动画没有自己显式设置使用起始值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的目标使用的值，如果动画没有自己显式设置结束值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> that generates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> ，用来生成<> *1> 或<> *1> 主机动画所使用。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 由当前实例的属性计算所得的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides a custom natural <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>.
trans-unit.target: 提供自定义的自然<xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref>时<xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>。</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> whose natural duration is desired.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>需要其自然持续时间。

trans-unit.source: If the last key frame of this animation is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime"></xref>, then this value is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>; otherwise it will be one second.
trans-unit.target: 如果此动画最后一个关键帧为<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime"> </xref>，则此值用作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>; 否则它将为&1; 秒。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将动画的输出值添加到正进行动画处理的属性的基值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该动画将其输出值添加到正进行动画处理而不是替换它; 属性的基值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示重复时是否累计该动画的值。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values accumulate only when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，动画累计的输出值时，才动画的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts, because its parent repeated, or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不会不会累计其值，或重新启动时，因为其父重复，因为其时钟已重新启动从<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the animation accumulates its values when it repeats; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在动画重复; 时累计它的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref>定义动画的对象。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animation's target values are defined by its KeyFrames property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画的目标值由其关键帧属性，其中包含一套<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>定义的具有其自己目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame.Value%2A>动画段</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: 动画运行时，它从进展一个键值为在指定下一步键次。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrame"></xref>定义动画的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectKeyFrameCollection.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 调用时当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>修改对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>属性应对其进行持久化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames>或开发你自己控制合并<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames>通常调用此方法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性值已更改其默认设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an ordered collection P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames associated with this animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此动画序列的 P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames 关联的有序的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames*></xref:System.Collections.IList>
